data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="POWERFLOW" filled="true">	
	<options name="base.parameter" info="Base Parameter" id="basic" narrow="false">
	    <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="job.name" label="Job Name" id="JOB_NAME" hidden="false"></option>

		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="core.number" label="计算CPU" id="NCPU" hidden="false">
            <option selected="true" id="4">4</option>
            <option selected="false" id="8">8</option>
            <option selected="false" id="16">16</option>
            <option selected="false" id="32">32</option>
            <option selected="false" id="48">48</option>
            <option selected="false" id="64">64</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="queue" label="Queue" id="QUEUE" hidden="false" defaultValue="normal">
            <option selected="false" id="lsdyna_high">lsdyna_high</option>
            <option selected="true" id="lsdyna_low">lsdyna_low</option>
        </option>	
	</options>
	
	<options name="application.parameter" info="Application Parameter" id="app" narrow="true">
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="memory.words" label="Memory(words)" id="MEMORY" hidden="false" defaultValue="128"></option>
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="task.type" label="Task type" id="TASKTYPE" hidden="false">
            <option selected="false" id="DIS">DIS</option>
            <option selected="true" id="SIM">SIM</option>
        </option>
	</options>

	<options name="inputfile.parameter" info="Input File" id="file" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" height="3" required="true" name="input.cdi.file" label="Cdi Input File" id="CDI" hidden="false"></option>
	</options>
</descriptor>
